channel.title: Black Artifacts on the Loading Screen
channel.description: When loading the game or a save, black flashes will appear on the splash screen. I could not get a screenshot as the flashes are too fast. It happens three or four times per load. It isn't a game breaker, but is mildly annoying. I was using the beta 1.0
